short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide certain metadata from recordings on IDAGIO's web player.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to hide performer names as well as performance dates on IDAGIO's web player for a more unbiased listening experience.

You can also copy the full performer list for any given work.
